area: Cape Wrath to Rattray Head including Orkney (1)

forecast.wind: Southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first in east, decreasing 5 at times in west.
forecast.sea: Very rough or high at first in east, otherwise rough or very rough, occasionally moderate in west.
forecast.visibility: Moderate or good, occasionally poor at first.
